name: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
description: The Kite Runner is a novel about Amir’s quest for redemption and forgiveness after betraying his childhood friend in war-torn Afghanistan.

name: Monsoon
author: Subin Bhattarai
description: Monsoon can be taken as a metaphor for love, how love can be unpredictable and with ups and downs.

name: Ijoriya
author: Subin Bhattarai
description: Ijoriya is a novel about love and self-discovery set in Nepal, exploring the complexities of personal and emotional growth.

name: MunaMadan
author: Laxmi Prasad Devkota
description: Munamadan is a poignant Nepali epic about a man's hardships and longing as he seeks a better life abroad.

name: The Diary Of A Young Girl
author: Anne Frank
description: The Diary of a Young Girl is an account of a Jewish girl's experiences hiding from the Nazis during World War II, revealing her hopes, and fears as she grows up in hiding.

name: Ikigai
author: Héctor García, Francesc Miralles
description: Ikigai delves into the Japanese philosophy of finding one's purpose in life, offering practical insights and strategies to discover and cultivate personal fulfillment and joy.

name: The Fifth Mountain
author: Paulo Coelho
description: The Fifth Mountain is a novel that follows the biblical prophet's journey of faith, resilience, and self-discovery as he faces trials and challenges to fulfill his divine purpose.

name: The Spy
genre: Spy fiction, Historical Fiction, Biographical Fiction
author: Paulo Coelho
description: The Spy recounts the life of Mata Hari, exploring her rise to fame and her role as a World War I spy.

name: The Alchemist
genre: Drama, Quest, Fantasy Fiction, Adventure fiction
author: Paulo Coelho
description: The Alchemist is a philosophical novel a shepherd who dreams of discovering a hidden treasure, and his journey to realize and understand the deeper meaning of life.

name: Veronika Decides to Die
author: Paulo Coelho
description: Veronika Decides to Die follows a young woman who finds herself in a mental institution after a failed suicide attempt, where she discovers new perspectives on life and learns about the value of living fully.

name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: Pride and Prejudice is a classic novel about Elizabeth Bennet's journey to love and self-discovery amidst societal expectations and class issues.

name: Palpasa Cafe
author: Narayan Wagle
description: Pride and Prejudice is a classic novel about Elizabeth Bennet's journey to love and self-discovery amidst societal expectations and class issues.

name: Half Girlfriend
author: Chetan Bhagat
description: Half Girlfriend is about Madhav and his complicated romance with Riya, a woman from a different cultural background, highlighting the struggles of love and societal expectations.

name: It Ends With Us
genre: Romance novel, Contemporary romance, Adult fiction
author: Colleen Hoover
description: It Ends with Us is a gripping novel about Lily Bloom, who must navigate difficult choices in love and relationships as her past and present collide.

name: It Starts With Us
genre: Romance novel, Contemporary romance, Adult fiction
author: Colleen Hoover
description: It Starts with Us follows Lily Bloom as she continues to navigate her new relationship and resolve past issues.

name: Karnali Blues
author: Buddhisagar
description: Karnali Blues is a novel about a young man's journey through love and struggle in rural Nepal.

name: Gauri
author: Madhav Prasad Ghimire
description: Gauri is an extra-ordinary tale about the life and death of this wife.

name: Siddhartha
author: Hermann Hesse
description: Siddhartha is a novel that deals with the spiritual journey of self-discovery

name: Tell Me A Story
author: Ravinder Singh
description: Tell Me a Story is about a man who finds solace and meaning through storytelling during a personal crisis.

name: Secrets At The Malory Towers
author: Enid Blyton
description: Secrets at Malory Towers is novel about a group of girls at a boarding school who uncover various mysteries, highlighting friendship.

name: चिना हराएको मान्छे
author: Hari Bansha Acharya
description: चिना हराएको मान्छे is an autobiogrpahy of a simple godfearing man who happens to loose his cheena.

name: महकाे म
author: Madan Krishna Shrestha
description: महकाे म is an autobiogrpahy that throws light on the unseen side of life of one of the most eminent entertainer.

name: I am Malala
author: Malala Yousafzai
description: I am Malala is a remarkable tale of a family uprooted by global terrorism, of the fight for girls' education.

name: War and Peace
genre: Historical novel, Historical Fiction, Saga, War story, Philosophy
author: Leo Tolstoy
